meta.title: JUINJANG | Injang Management Co., Ltd.
meta.description: Total Solutions for Dormant Spaces - Hospitality, F&B, and Retail Business Operations

hero.title: REBIRTH;REVERSE
hero.subtitle: Total Solutions for Dormant Spaces
hero.description: The insight to see the potential in spaces that have yet to shine

about.subtitle: About Us
about.title: We Operate with the Heart of an Owner
about.description: Through Injang Management, we transform dormant facilities in society by giving them new concepts and culture, turning them into successful establishments.
about.vision: Injang Management's hospitality, F&B, and retail businesses collect real-time information on dormant spaces and create optimal results through interior design, marketing, operations, and partnerships under given conditions.

services.title: Professional Operations Consulting
services.description: We create efficient and professional processes through data analysis, from commercial area analysis to revenue analysis, to maximize sales.

services.title: Sustainable Brand Development
services.description: We develop our own brands and expand business and generate revenue through various partnerships.

services.title: Various Forms of Partnership
services.description: We are conducting various partnerships through our brand, including investment development, consignment operations, consignment sales, franchising, and affiliate business.

cta.title: Partnership Inquiry
cta.description: Please feel free to send us any inquiries related to facility rental, facility consignment, facility investment, remodeling, and operations consulting.

brand.subtitle: Our Brand
brand.title: GLAM DOG
brand.description: GLAM DOG, our first brand, is a premium pet-friendly pension brand. We offer a special retreat at 8 locations nationwide.

partnership.subtitle: Partnership
partnership.title: Various Forms of Partnership
partnership.description: JUINJANG offers various types of partnerships. We provide various solutions according to the partner's situation and offer optimal solutions together with our developed brands.

types.title: Development Investment
types.description: This is a form of direct or indirect investment in business projects conducted by JUINJANG. It is for those who have capital but lack the resources to develop and operate, or those who want to make small investments in our projects and receive profit sharing.
types.stats: Currently, 9 development investments have been made: 7 lodging facilities and 2 F&B facilities under our first brand, GLAM DOG.

types.title: Consignment Operations
types.description: When it is difficult to directly operate an existing facility for various reasons, you can entrust professional management and operations to JUINJANG and share the profits.
types.stats: Currently, we are conducting consignment operations for our first brand, GLAM DOG.

types.title: Brand Franchise
types.description: While operating your existing facility yourself, you can use JUINJANG's brand and receive related services, settling a certain commission.
types.stats: We are currently preparing brand franchising for our first brand, GLAM DOG.

cta.title: Partnership Inquiry
cta.description: If you have any questions or need consultation regarding JUINJANG partnership, please feel free to contact us anytime.

contact.subtitle: Contact us
contact.title: Get in Touch
contact.description: Please feel free to contact us for any inquiries related to facility rental, facility consignment, facility investment, remodeling, and operations consulting.

footer.description: We provide total solutions for dormant spaces. Through hospitality, F&B, and retail businesses, we create new possibilities for spaces.
